sentences.en: After a year in ashen Paris, he was in a chromatic delirium.
sentences.cn: 在灰白的巴黎住了一年后, 梵谷在这里陷入著色的欣狂.

sentences.en: He fell back, shocked, his face ashen.
sentences.cn: 他吓得往后退了一步，面如死灰。

sentences.en: He hung over it a moment, ashen.
sentences.cn: 他的脸色苍白,双手扶住它站了一会儿.

sentences.en: He seemed to be fairly old for his moustache was ashen - grey.
sentences.cn: 他看上去相当苍老,两撇八字胡须已经灰白了.

sentences.en: Her ashen face show how much the news have shocked her.
sentences.cn: 她灰白的脸显示出那消息使她多麽震惊.

sentences.en: Her ashen face showed how much the news had shocked her.
sentences.cn: 她灰白的脸显示出那消息使她多么震惊.

sentences.en: His ashen face showed how shocked he was.
sentences.cn: 他面如土色,说明他多么惊骇.

sentences.en: His face was ashen now, and beads of sweat broke out on his temples.
sentences.cn: 他的脸色倏又转为灰白, 汗珠布满了他的额角.

sentences.en: See the ashen that old woman person frightens only: Fierce, fierce.
sentences.cn: 只见老妇人吓的面如土色道: 厉害, 厉害.

sentences.en: She listened to the tragic news ashen - faced.
sentences.cn: 她听到这一悲惨消息,脸都白了.

sentences.en: The survivors were ashen-faced and visibly shaken.
sentences.cn: 生还者们面色惨白，看起来仍然惊魂未定。

sentences.en: They listened ashen-faced to the news.
sentences.cn: 他们听着消息时面如死灰。

sentences.en: Upon seeing their ashen faces, Hsin - mei said, " Did you throw up?
sentences.cn: 辛楣瞧他们脸色灰白, 说: “ 吐了 么 ?

sentences.en: Why do you all want to make Baby Ashen cry?
sentences.cn: 你为什么全部使宝贝成为灰色的哭声?

trans.tran_cn: 灰白色的，由灰烬构成的，白蜡树的，梣木（制成）的
trans.tran_en: looking very pale because you are ill, shocked, or frightened
